item.description:
Meet other people who practice mind-body therapies including body psychotherapists, bodyworkers, counselors, energy medicine practitioners, alternative and holistic medicine.
The heart of this group includes practitioners who integrate the body and touch with some sort of emotional work or counseling. However, we welcome others with complementary and related modalities.
We meet the second Friday of each month for a potluck lunch from 11:30 am - 1:30 pm in Newton, MA. Meetings include time for networking, colleagial conversation and a presentation by one of members.
item.name: Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
